description: The top court says new judges are not independent, while lawmakers vote to fire those who are critical.
title: Poland judges: Parliament and Supreme Court issue rival rulings
title_page: Poland judges: Parliament and Supreme Court issue rival rulings - BBC News
maintext: The government has argued that its sweeping changes were necessary to tackle corruption and make the judicial system more efficient. But critics, including the European Commission, say the independence of Poland's judges is being eroded.
